price: Тақводорларни Раҳмон ҳузурига азиз меҳмон сифатида тўплаган кунимизда.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَفۡدٗا

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yawma naḥshuru al-mutaqīna ilā al-raḥmāni wafdan
